poem:
"Lines Drawn in Political Dust"

In the halls of power, secrets shadow-dance,
Mike Johnson - mouthpiece of urgency's stance.
Mayorkas, a puppet in the grand game,
Where words are weapons, truth the aim.
Spyglass turns on innocents beneath stars,
Empowered by Fisa's controversial bars.
Yet, round the globe, sleepless eyes watch the power play,
As morning breaks on a new D.C. day.
